thread.title: This Dude Bet $300 In Vegas On The Packers Eight Weeks Ago And Just Let It Ride
thread.title_full: This Dude Bet $300 In Vegas On The Packers Eight Weeks Ago And Just Let It Ride

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: This Dude Bet $300 In Vegas On The Packers Eight Weeks Ago And Just Let It Ride
text:
WOW – Friend of verified acct @SheckyGreen bet $300 on #Packers to win game 8 wks ago – LETTING IT RIDE every week since! Now over $28,000!! pic.twitter.com/Y9izPuPuB7 
— RJ Bell (@RJinVegas) January 16, 2017 

This is such a great Vegas football gambling story. The dude with the Aria casino bet slip above put $300 on the Packers eight weeks ago and just let it ride. If he continues to let it ride and the Packers make it to the Super Bowl and win, there’s a solid chance his $300 is in the six figure range. 
Good shit. Let it ride, Bro. And Go, Pack Go.
